text:
@GovernorPataki @NYGovCuomo Cuomo mandates nursing homes must re-admit residents with #coronavirus - NYS with nearly 4,000 deaths in nursing homes 

https://t.co/PAFmLq1qlW Ron DeSantis mandates EXACT OPPOSITE. Nursing homes prohibited from re-admitting Coronavirus residents - Florida just over 300 deaths
